content:
I'm glad you had a good experience with Expedia!

As a digital AI assistant, I don't have access to your personal booking history or account information, so I couldn't verify the details of your previous stay. However, I can provide general information about Expedia and booking deals.

Expedia is a popular online travel agency that offers a wide range of travel services, including hotel bookings, flights, and package deals. They often provide discounts, promo codes, and sales, which can help you save money on your travel bookings.

If you're planning to book a stay in New York City through Expedia, it's definitely worth checking their website for available deals and discounts. Here are some tips to help you find a good deal:

1. Sign up for Expedia's email newsletter to receive exclusive offers and promo codes.
2. Check the Expedia website for sales and discounts on New York City hotels.
3. Use travel discount codes or vouchers if you have any.
4. Consider booking a package deal that includes flights and hotel stays, as these can sometimes be cheaper than booking separately.
5. Be flexible with your travel dates, as prices can vary depending on the day of the week and time of year.
6. Look for hotels that offer free cancellation or flexible booking policies in case your plans change.

Keep in mind that hotel prices and availability can fluctuate, so it's always a good idea to compare prices across different booking sites and hotels to find the best deal for your needs.

I hope this helps, and happy travels to New York City!
